split.label: Split
split.description: Split a PDF into multiple files.

remove.label: Remove
remove.description: Remove specific pages from your PDF.
remove.inputHint: Enter a comma-separated list of page numbers: 4,7,12-16

extract.label: Extract Pages
extract.description: Extract selected pages from your PDF.
extract.inputHint: Enter a comma-separated list of page numbers: 4,7,12-16

organize.label: Organize
organize.inputHint: Enter a comma-separated list of page numbers: 4,7,12-16

rotate.label: Rotate
rotate.description: Rotate pages to the correct orientation.

multi-page.label: Multi-Page Layout
multi-page.description: Merge multiple pages into a single page.

word.label: Word
word.description: Convert your PDF to editable Word documents.

ppt.label: PPT
ppt.description: Convert your PDF to editable PPT documents.

image.label: Image
image.description: Convert your PDF to image files.

html.label: HTML
html.description: Convert your PDF to HTML files.

xml.label: XML
xml.description: Convert your PDF to XML files.

csv.label: CSV
csv.description: Convert your PDF to CSV files.

markdown.label: Markdown
markdown.description: Convert your PDF into Markdown format.

structure.title: Start Structuring Your PDF
structure.description: Select a tool from the left sidebar to split, merge, organize or rotate pages in your PDF file.

convert.title: Convert PDF to Another Format
convert.description: Select a tool from the left sidebar to convert your PDF to Word, Image, HTML, and more.

security.title: Sign, Secure, and Redact Your PDF
security.description: Select a tool from the left sidebar to add passwords or watermarks, sign with certificates, redact sensitive content, or manage file permissions.

editor.title: View, Annotate, and Edit Your PDF
editor.description: Select a tool from the left sidebar to add images or page numbers, compare versions, change metadata, or clean up scanned content.
